commits.author: Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew: /** Runs searches for each segment separately, using the * provided ExecutorService. IndexSearcher will not * shutdown/awaitTermination this ExecutorService on * close; you must do so, eventually, on your own. NOTE: * if you are using {@link NIOFSDirectory}, do not use * the shutdownNow method of ExecutorService as this uses * Thread.interrupt under-the-hood which can silently * close file descriptors (see LUCENE-2239). * * @lucene.experimental */ public IndexSearcher(IndexReader r, ExecutorService executor) { this(r, false, executor); }

commits.author: Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew: /** Runs searches for each segment separately, using the * provided ExecutorService. IndexSearcher will not * shutdown/awaitTermination this ExecutorService on * close; you must do so, eventually, on your own. NOTE: * if you are using {@link NIOFSDirectory}, do not use * the shutdownNow method of ExecutorService as this uses * Thread.interrupt under-the-hood which can silently * close file descriptors (see LUCENE-2239). * * @lucene.experimental */ public IndexSearcher(IndexReader r, ExecutorService executor) { this(r.getTopReaderContext(), executor); }
